Responsible for organizing and managing Local Startups Meet Bangalore 2019. Got associations with media partners, outreach partners and venue partner for the event. Also managed to secure guest speakers, investors and startups for the same.

Worked as a part of Corporate and Media Relations team and got associations for Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive 2019 held in 23 cities.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Responsible for giving suggestions on how to implement Visual Management in ITC Malur noodle & pasta factory. Made a comprehensive plan on the ways of implementing the Kanban System of cards on the shop floor.

education.title: McGill University
education.description: Thesis topic: Computational analysis of propeller slipstream and effect on DEP aircraft Description: Analysed and validated a computational fluid dynamics (CFD) propeller model to simulate the slipstream. The model was integrated with a distributed electric propulsion (DEP) aircraft simulation and it was verified further.
education.description_html: Thesis topic: Computational analysis of propeller slipstream and effect on DEP aircraftDescription: Analysed and validated a computational fluid dynamics (CFD) propeller model to simulate the slipstream.
